name: Tumblr No Caps
description: A simple style that lowercases dashboard text (importantly, posts are lowercased.) to ease users that may be uncomfortable with posts with excessive capitalisations. Made especially for bdpfixit.

user.name: Hybrid-Dragon
user.about:
3d model artist, game dev, web nerd
@R_CADEZONE on twitter.

additional_info:
You are free to copy this style and apply it to any other site you wish. Simply create a new blank style and change the target domain.

24 Dec 2014 v1.0 - Initial Release
25 Dec 2014 v1.01 - Side stuff on Dashboard (Recommended, etc.) should be lowercased.
5 Jan 2015 v1.1 - Other commonly-used elements from blogs are now affected.
